Content.Text: The shop is closed for the festival.
The shop is closed on this day of the week.
It's outside business hours. The shop is closed.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to my antique shop. I have all kinds of
furniture and other interior items with which to
decorate your house.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to my antique shop. Are you here to
find some quality decorations, <NICKNAME>?
Looks like it's not open today...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you need anything else, please come back
again.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next time, I promise I'll have items available to
catch your discerning eye, <NICKNAME>.
